text: Enywe Abasuubili mulenjile mutsinzu tsio murumwa tawe halali okhuula shinga mufuchililwa okhutsia okhulia, eshilibwa shilalindwa okhuya tawe, halali nimulangwa injile nenimumala okhulia musalaane(mubweo) ne mulekhala okhupa tsimbakha tawe, shichila likuwa lino lisinyisinjia Omurumwa, naye abalolelanga tsisoni, ne Nyasaye shalolanga tsisoni okhuboola bwatoto tawe. Ne nimureeba (abakhaye baye) mubareebele inyuma weshikalilo (weyipasia) , okhukhola kano khwitsa okhwosia emioyo chienyu nende emioyo chiabu, ne shimukhoyeshela okhumusinyisia Omurumwa wa Nyasaye tawe. Nohomba okhuteshia Abakhasi baye ye niyakhafwa. Toto likhuwa lino ni tsimbi tsikhongo imbeli wa Nyasaye
